summary: Identified issue with sessioncard rendering size
Investigated spawning behavior of session cards
Located potential UI constraint preventing proper resizing

suggestedTasks.title: Implement dynamic sessioncard resizing mechanism
suggestedTasks.description: Create a flexible resizing system for sessioncards that allows users to adjust their size dynamically. This requires modifying the current rendering logic in the UI components to support user-controlled dimensions. Investigate current CSS constraints and implement a responsive design approach that maintains layout integrity while enabling user interaction.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation restricts user interaction and UI flexibility

suggestedTasks.title: Add user interaction tests for sessioncard resizing
suggestedTasks.description: Develop comprehensive test suite to validate sessioncard resizing functionality across different screen sizes and interaction methods. Create unit and integration tests that verify resize behaviors, ensuring consistent performance and preventing potential layout breaks.
suggestedTasks.reason: No existing tests cover sessioncard interaction capabilities

gotchas: Current CSS might have hard-coded size limitations
